ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  flag=source.getVariable()=="1"?true:false
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.data.vs.forEach((booklet) => {
    array.push({ 
    	    name:String(booklet.vN),
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.cs.forEach((chapter) => {
    	  vip = chapter.sS!="1"?"🔒":""
    	  href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/`+baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]+`/`+chapter.id+`/`;
    	  href=flag?href+",{'webView': true}":href
      array.push({
        name: String(vip+chapter.cN),
        url: href,
        time:"更新时间:"+String(chapter.uT)+"  字数:"+String(chapter.cnt),
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

jms=JSON.parse(result);
jm=String(jms.body.content).split("a2o@");
function formatSeconds(value) { 
var theTime = parseInt(value);// 秒 
var theTime1 = 0;// 分 
var theTime2 = 0;// 小时 
if(theTime > 60) { 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime/60); 
theTime = parseInt(theTime%60); 
if(theTime1 > 60) { 
theTime2 = parseInt(theTime1/60); 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime1%60); } } 
var result = ""+parseInt(theTime)+"秒"; 
if(theTime1 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime1)+"分"+result; } 
if(theTime2 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime2)+"小时"+result; } 
return result; } 
if(jm.length>1){
key="S3VqaWFuZ0FwcDc0NzYwNQ==";
iv=jm[0];
data=jm[1];
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);
with(javaImport) {
    function decode(content) {
        decode = Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(content));
             byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
             byteArrayInputStream = new ByteArrayInputStream(decode);
            gZIPInputStream = new GZIPInputStream(byteArrayInputStream);
            bArr = String(" ").getBytes(); 
            while (true) {
                read = gZIPInputStream.read(bArr);
                if (read > 0) {
                    byteArrayOutputStream.write(bArr, 0, read);
                } else {
                    gZIPInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayOutputStream.close();
                    return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
                }
          }
    }
}

decode(java.aesBase64DecodeToString(data,java.base64Decode(key),"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",java.base64Decode(iv)))}
else{"新章节需要解封\n"+"解锁时间还需："+formatSeconds(String(jms.body.left_seconds))}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  var $ = JSON.parse(result)
  let bid=baseUrl.replace(/.*[iI]d=/,"")
  var array = []
  $.data.vs.forEach((vInfo) => {
  	isVip=vInfo.vS==1
    array.push({title:vInfo.vN,isVol:true,isVip:isVip})
    vInfo.cs.forEach((cInfo) => {
      if(isVip){
    	  href="//vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/"+bid+"/"+cInfo.id+",{\"webView\": true}"
    	 }else{
    	  href="//read.qidian.com/chapter/"+cInfo.cU;
    	 }
      array.push({
        title: cInfo.cN,
        url: href,
        isVip: isVip,
        isPayd:isVip&&cInfo.sS==1,
        info:cInfo.uT +" 字数: "+cInfo.cnt,
        isVol:false
      })
    })
  })
array
</js>

if(isGet){
resp=JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://h5.lc1001.com/h5/login,{"method":"POST","body":"pcd=账号&pwd=密码"}'))

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("1701019k").getBytes(),"DES");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AQIDBAUGBwg="));
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
String(decrypt(JSON.parse(result).DATA.CTXT)).replace(/{{title}}/,'')
</js>

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
  function decode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("UP8XDHB/5Z29QGFovGSxyPwn9egkxEazAPz6Uoo80Zc="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      let bytes=Base64.decode(String(word).getBytes(),2);
      chipher.init(2,key,iv);
      return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decode(result)
</js>

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
  function encode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("UP8XDHB/5Z29QGFovGSxyPwn9egkxEazAPz6Uoo80Zc="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      chipher.init(1,key,iv);
      return java.encodeURI(Base64.encodeToString(chipher.doFinal(String(word).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP));
    }
  function decode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("UP8XDHB/5Z29QGFovGSxyPwn9egkxEazAPz6Uoo80Zc="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      let bytes=Base64.decode(String(word).getBytes(),2);
      chipher.init(2,key,iv);
      return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "💰":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, " "),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true or false
  let obj = {showjname: false}
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

bookSourceComment:
1.登陆后阅读进度回自动同步云端，章节索引会自动跟随云端(App)进度，请在App里选择章节
2.登陆阅读限免或已购vip章节为空时, 试试书籍详情页, 源变量填：1
3.清除缓存再刷新

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "🔒":""
    let pc_url = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let mob_url = `https://m.qidian.com/book/${bid}/${chapter.id}.html`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${mob_url},{'webView': true}` : pc_url
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, "\x20\x20"),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

<js>
var cat1='东方玄幻,古典仙侠,现代修真,都市生活,都市超能,架空历史,虚拟网游,时空穿梭,末世进化';
var cat2='穿越,重生,异界,修真,都市,异能';
var cat3='修仙,奇遇,奋斗,争霸,权谋,升级';
var cat4='古代言情,穿越重生,浪漫言情,烽火情缘,忧伤青春,玄幻仙侠,都市幻想,悬疑灵异';
var cat5='穿越,重生,宅斗,宫廷';
var list=[];
function getUrl(cats,url1){
cats.split(',').forEach((i)=>{list.push(i+'::'+url1+i+'&query='+i+'&page={{page}}')});
}
list.push('◎                        男生分类                        ◎::');
getUrl(cat1,'/api/getCateDetail?channel=男频&status=完结&count=10&cate2=');
list.push('◎                        男生背景                        ◎::');
getUrl(cat2,'/api/getCateDetail?channel=男频&status=完结&count=10&tag_name=');
list.push('◎                        男生情节                        ◎::');
getUrl(cat3,'/api/getCateDetail?channel=男频&status=完结&count=10&tag_name=');
list.push('◎                        女生分类                        ◎::');
getUrl(cat4,'/api/getCateDetail?channel=女频&status=完结&count=10&cate2=');
list.push('◎                        女生背景                        ◎::');
getUrl(cat5,'/api/getCateDetail?channel=女频&status=完结&count=10&tag_name=');
list.join('\n');
</js>
